steps.title: Welcome to the Educ8 Live Customizer
steps.content: You can now customize your theme for Moodle on the fly. As you make quick design edits (left-hand side), you’ll be able to see the changes reflected on the right-hand screen. You can tweak everything that matters for a simple user interface and a superior user experience - fonts, buttons, colours, favicon and more. Let your Moodle design do the talking now! Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Let’s get you started - Just click, don’t stress
steps.content: All customizer settings are available here. You can easily tweak almost any aspect of your Moodle design with no coding at all. If you don’t like how your theme looks, just change it! - be it the header, footer, font, buttons, colours or the sidebars. Speed up your editing and enhance the learning experience! Click Next to continue.

steps.title: How to customize the various elements of your Moodle site
steps.content: In Global settings, you can customize Favicon (the icon for your Moodle site in the address bar), font and text color for both body and headings, set colors or images as page background, design buttons with padding, borders and colors of your choice etc. Click on Global to proceed

steps.title: Tweak the text per your liking
steps.content: Effortlessly customize text settings for the body as well as headings. Click on Typography to proceed.

steps.title: Choose the right style for the main body of your Moodle site
steps.content: Next, click on Body to style and design the page body as you please. Here you get to choose the font family, the font size and weight, the text color, and a lot more. Similarly, you can also style your headings the way you want. Click on Body to proceed.

steps.title: Change the font as you see fit
steps.content: You can easily change the font size for the entire site by picking the font size that works for you. Trying changing the font size to see the changes on the right hand side.

steps.title: Live Preview the changes as you go
steps.content: You can quickly preview the changes right there on your screen as you work and edit your theme without navigating elsewhere. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Save the changes you want to keep or discard and start new
steps.content: In case you mess up and want to start customizing again, click on Reset. Once happy with the settings, click on Save to save all the design changes and close the customizer by clicking on the Close button. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Preview for different devices.
steps.content: Check how your Moodle site would look on different devices with this handiest design option. It not only lets you see how your site looks but also helps you see how it functions right away, without having to manually test it on multiple devices. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Review your new design in a better way
steps.content: Click here to see all the changes in full page view. This puts the entire focus on all your design changes you just made with maximum screen space and minimum distractions. You can easily get a better idea of how your new layout would finally appear without all the screen clutter. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Have fun customizing your theme on the go!
steps.content: Hurray! That’s it! You can now start customizing in real-time to give your learners the best Moodle experience If you got any questions, we are just a click away :)
